text:
Did this thread a while back with some costing data on #remdesivir from my research

Around $1,000* per day via injections.  Not sure if that will change given circumstances

That's why other #antivirals like #chloroquine still important IMO

 *source🇫🇷🇨🇦: https://t.co/NJNGxyoYmk https://t.co/A0ArjrYYGX
